page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT - ETTRICK VALLEY
page.content: Surprisingly this area has its fair share of employment for the type of area it is. Farming is the mainstay and there is an old Inn which employs local people. A caravan site and camping area offers employment for one family - another runs a pottery business. One area has been cultivated for the growth and sale of dried flowers and nearby is a pony trekking establishment. While one enterprising family keeps bees and sells honey, two local houses have bed and breakfast facilities and there is a small tearoom attached to one of them. Others in the area travel to towns for their employment.
